Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~n/e~taui~ni nak e~qoun n~naidwron: nem n/e~taue~nou e~jwou: nem n/e~taue~nou e~bol hitotou: moi nwou t/rou m~pibe,e pie~bolqen niv/oui.
Remember, O Lord, those who have brought to You these gifts, those on whose behalf they have been brought, and those by whom they have been brought. Give them all the heavenly reward.
اذكر ياربُّ الذين قَدَّموا لكَ هذه القرابينَ، والذين قُدِّمَت عنهُم، والذين قُدِّمَت بواسِطَتِهِم، أَعطِهِم كلَّهُم الأجرَ السمائي.
